rukus.text: 38|65|Gen tte yaru ga ī. `Watashi wa keikoku-sha ni suginai. Yuiitsu no kata, teikō dekinai kata, arrā no soto ni wa kami wa nai nodearu.
38|66|Ten to ji, soshite sonoaida no ban'yū no shu, iryoku narabinaku kan'yōde ara reru.'
38|67|Itte yaru ga ī. `Kore wa shikō no shirasedearu.
38|68|Anata gata wa, sorekara somuki saruga.
38|69|Katsute (tenshi no) takai ikai no mono-tachi no rongi ni tsuite wa, watashi wa nani no chishiki mo nakatta.
38|70|Kore ga watashi ni keiji sa reta no wa, tada watashi ga Kōmei ni keikoku suru tamedearu.'
38|71|Anata no omo ga, tenshi-tachi ni,`ware wa doro kara ningen o tsukurou to shite iru.' To ōse rareta toki o omoe.
38|72|`Sorede ware ga, kare (ningen) o katachidzukuri, soreni rei o fukikondanaraba, anata gata wa fuku shite kare ni sajida shi nasai.'
38|73|Sokode tenshi-tachi wa, kai isseini sajida shitaga,
38|74|iburīsu dake wa sō shinakatta. Kare wa kōman de, shinkō o kobamu mono to natta.
38|75|Kare wa ōse rareta. `Iburīsu yo, ware no tezukara tsukutta mono ni sajida suru no ni, nani ga anata o samatageta no ka. Anata wa kōman'na no ka, soretomo takai (iryoku aru)-shana no ka.'
38|76|Kare wa mōshiageta. `Watashi wa kare (ningen) yori mo sugurete imasu, anata wa hi de watashi o o tsukuri ni narimashitaga, kare wa doro de tsukura reta dakedesu.'
38|77|Kare wa ōse rareta. `Sorenara anata wa, koko kara dete iki nasai, hontōni imawashīkara.
38|78|Soshite ware kara no mikagiri wa, shinpan no hi made kanarazu anata no ue ni arou.'
38|79|Kare wa mōshiageta. `Omo yo, kare-ra ga yobiokosa reru hi made, yūyo o negaimasu.'
38|80|Kare wa ōse rareta. `Anata o yūyo shiyou.
38|81|Sadame rareta nichiji made.'
38|82|Kare wa mōshiageta. `Soredewa, anata no o ikō ni kakete chikaimasu. Watashi wa kare-ra (ningen) subete no mono o yūwaku shimasu.
38|83|Kare-ra no naka no, anata no kenkyona shimo be o nozoite wa.'
38|84|Kare wa ōse rareta. `Sore wa shinjitsudearu. Ware kara mo shinjitsu o iu.
38|85|Ware wa, anata to anata ni shitagau subete no mono de, jigoku o mitasudearou.'
38|86|Ie,`watashi wa kono (kuruān) ni taishi nani no hōshū mo anata gata ni motomenai. Mata watashi wa gizen-shade wanai.
38|87|Kore wa sho minzoku ni taisuru kunkai nihokanaranai.
38|88|Toki ga kitara, anata gata wa sore ga shinjitsudearu koto o kanarazu shirudearou.'
